summary: Comprehensive testing of Free Fire Diamond Top-Up Platform completed. All backend APIs (16/16 tests passed) and frontend UI flows working correctly. User login, admin login, dashboard, products CRUD, Garena accounts management, and user management all functional.

issues: Minor: ESLint warning in TopUp.js about missing dependency in useEffect - not affecting functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Backend passlib/bcrypt warning in logs (AttributeError: module 'bcrypt' has no attribute '__about__') - not affecting functionality but should be monitored
ESLint warning in TopUp.js: useEffect missing dependency 'fetchUserProfile' - minor issue
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: User login/logout, Admin login, Admin Dashboard with stats, Products Management (12 products with CRUD), Garena Accounts (hidden credentials), User Management (block/unblock), TopUp page with wallet balance and Bangladesh server. Backend APIs all return correct data. No mocked APIs - all real implementations.

features_tested.user_login: PASS - testclient/test123 credentials work, wallet balance ₹50.00 displayed
features_tested.admin_dashboard: PASS - displays Total Sales, Total Orders, Failed Orders, Wallet Balance stats
features_tested.admin_products: PASS - shows all 12 products, edit price functionality works
features_tested.admin_garena_accounts: PASS - shows accounts with hidden credentials (***hidden***)
features_tested.admin_users: PASS - shows 6 users, block/unblock functionality works
features_tested.topup_page: PASS - displays wallet balance ₹50.00, Bangladesh server fixed, all diamond packages shown
features_tested.api_packages_list: PASS - returns all 12 products with correct schema
